tool_description: An api for Football legends of every country
name: Football_api
title: Football_api

api_list.name: Legends
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of countries and the football legends
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football_api8.p.rapidapi.com/legends"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football_api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football_api8.p.rapidapi.com/legends"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football_api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
